about.title: ABOUT DYMAXA
about.heading: We Create Opportunities for Candidates & Companies
about.description:
Dymaxa is here to help connect opportunity with talent! 

Are you looking for opportunities? Are you looking for Talent? 
Signing up with us you can find both.

We setup this platform for talented people to upload CVâ€™s and list themselves for work and show off their profiles to companies looking for individuals to fill positions. And for the Companies you can upload jobs for candidates to apply to making your job as a company easier finding talented individuals to fill the roles you need to fill.
